alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Lincoln; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 1:38PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Union, central Claiborne and north central Lincoln Parishes through 230 PM CST... At 137 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Homer, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homer, Bernice, Cooley, Lisbon, Spearsville, Lillie, Antioch, Taylorville, Summerfield, Spring Lake, Corney Lake, Lake Clairborne and Shiloh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northwestern Louisiana.
